items.title: Web View Wrapper
items.description:
Phonegap, Cordova or other similar tools allow developers to write HTML and CSS, and employ the mobile's  native API's.

The app is a wrapper, which loads html from a webserver.

items.title: Java
items.description: The Java programming language is the core language for Android development.

items.title: React Native
items.description:
React Native is a relative young project with major early adoption by developers thanks to a unique combination of Javascript language environment, maxOS/Windows/Linux support and actual native Android and iOS compilation. The write-once, deploy everywhere philosophy has previously been disappointing, but React Native comes very close, see ([React Native at Instagram](https://engineering.instagram.com/react-native-at-instagram-dd828a9a90c7#.e9jz0r6e8)).

Included devtools like Hot Reload make it very developer friendly compared to java or objective-c.

https://facebook.github.io/react-native/
